wikipedia.governance_note: Use only read-only encyclopedia retrieval with deterministic query normalization.

openalex.governance_note: Use bibliographic metadata retrieval for explainability evidence and citations.

openstreetmap-nominatim.governance_note: Use only coarse geocoding of non-sensitive locations with deterministic normalization; disallow personal/home address resolution.

crossref.governance_note: Use DOI metadata for provenance-rich knowledge references.

arxiv.governance_note: Use preprint metadata retrieval for transparent research traceability.

openlibrary.governance_note: Use bibliographic lookup for deterministic reference expansion.
